function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of smartphone technology for diagnosis and imaging may lead to misinterpretation of medical images and misdiagnosis of contagious diseases like covid-19.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased reliance on telemedicine and mobile technology for healthcare consultations may result in inadequate physical examination and assessment of contagious diseases.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through mobile technology usage in healthcare and social settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on mobile technology for healthcare may lead to data breaches and privacy concerns","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential overload of healthcare systems due to increased reliance on mobile technology for diagnosis and treatment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in face-to-face consultations during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased use of smartphone technology for covid-19 data and information updates","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of economic and social wellbeing due to covid-19 impact","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proactive assessment of future outbreak chances based on current infection and death rates.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient monitoring of mobility and contact data for understanding disease spread during future outbreaks.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Collection and storage of personal health and travel data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Notification alert for vicinity near red zone based on user location","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for disease transmission through proximity contact","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation and infodemic through social media","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of traceability and fact-checking in encrypted messaging platforms","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data security in mobile applications for covid-19 surveillance","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of personal data such as national identity number, passport number, phone number, travel history, and health status.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Centralized storage of transaction details, calls, and messages.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Storage of gps history and wi-fi information","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Open-source code for the application","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on bluetooth technology for proximity tracing","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to data collection and storage","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential misuse of app data by unauthorized parties","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Storage of contact data on the user’s device","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Retention of contact data on the central server","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gps location tracking of positive patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring financial transactions, gps location, and cctv footage","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Live-location tracking of patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contact tracing and sharing location history and contacts","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity tracking and real-time dashboard of covid-19 cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of sensitive user information such as age, profession, medical history, and travel history for risk assessment.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sensitive user information between mobile devices during close contact.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of misinformation and false self-diagnosis through the app.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on the accuracy of user-provided information for contact tracing and monitoring.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unrequired self-isolation due to self-positives","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of spreading virus by visiting hospitals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of contact tracing apps for monitoring covid-19 cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of medical care apps may lead to misdiagnosis or incorrect treatment due to lack of physical examination.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate detection of disease spread through mobile apps leading to false positives and unnecessary self-isolation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on mobile technology for contact tracing and exposure monitoring","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid increase in use of grocery apps and delivery services","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on minimum number of satellites for accurate position determination","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on aging satellites with limited lifespan","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of gps technology to monitor and record interaction frequency between infected and non-infected persons.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring user movements and alerting them based on zonal presence green zone or red zone .","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interference from devices using 2.4 ghz radio frequencies can reduce wi-fi speed or cause loss of internet connection.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wi-fi networks can be used for location tracing during the ongoing pandemic.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through proximity detection using bluetooth le for contact tracing.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns in mhealth sensing applications due to data collection via bluetooth technology.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of unauthorized data disclosure in discoverable mode of bluetooth devices.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"}]}
